about_the_game:
Spark is a side-scrolling shmup with a combo-based shooting system that allows the player to create hundreds of beautiful and deadly bullet patterns. Dodge tons of bullets, destroy strange enemies, and defeat powerful bosses on your way to discovering your true purpose in a containerized world.

In this Demo you will have access to Survival Mode, a procedural wave-based game mode where the goal is to survive as long as possible. Increase your multiplier by creating combos and destroy enemies until you are inevitably overran. Submit your score to the leader board for a chance to win a free copy of Spark on release.
detailed_description:
Special Offer

The Leaderboards will be open from 11/3-11/5. The top scores from weekend will earn a free copy of the full version of Spark, as well as a poster and some knightmare games stickers. Do you have what it takes to survive?!
